entry.title: Enable exFAT on macOS 11.2 and Ubuntu 20.04
entry.summary: In this tutorial we will set up enable exFAT compatibility on macOS 11.2 and Ubuntu 20.04.

entry.title: Make a bootable USB with dd on Linux and macOS
entry.summary: you've probably used uNetBootin, Etcher, and Rufus a dozen times to make a bootable usb drive. your grandma loves those apps.

entry.title: Encrypt Ubuntu Across Two Disks (SSD and HDD)
entry.summary: In this tutorial, we'll setup an encrypted install of Ubuntu 20.04 LTS across two disks.
